definition: ungrateful/heartless/to fail to be loyal to one's love
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

sentences.english: The east doesnt hurt to call all ordered the destruction of the world teach disciple co-worker Hannah.
sentences.chinese: 东方不败下令召集所有魔教弟子杀尽天下负心汉。

sentences.english: There have been many stories of those Jasons, but they can draw no serious attention from girls.
sentences.chinese: 负心人的故事岁多，但引不起女孩子们的真正注意。

sentences.english: Tong Tin Ho, you heartless guy, I couldn't kill you.
sentences.chinese: 唐天豪，你这个负心人，当年我杀不了你。

sentences.english: She suspected and feared that this defendant would fail her .
sentences.chinese: 她疑心并且深怕这个被告会负心。

sentences.english: Women make the men who is easy to be inconstant in love faithful by lovely cunning.
sentences.chinese: 女人用一种美丽的狡猾来对付容易负心的男人。

sentences.english: Duteous love can not contain the onerous treachery.
sentences.chinese: 忠贞的爱情容不下负心的背叛。

sentences.english: This question is splashed across magazine covers every time there's a fresh high-profile cheating scandal.
sentences.chinese: 每当有新鲜的负心丑闻爆出，杂志上就满是此类问题。

definition: completely lacking any feeling or sense of justice (idiom); cold and ruthless
hatred caused by love (idiom)/to grow to hate someone because of unrequited love for that person
lit. heart of wolf and lungs of dog (idiom)/cruel and unscrupulous
to change at once on seeing sth different (idiom); loving fads and novelty/never satisfied with what one has
human face, beast's heart (idiom); two-faced/malicious and duplicitous
